display_long_description:
Experience the most immersive VR basketball game ever with Hoopzter!
Choose from 10 classic game modes including 1v1, 2v2, 3v3, King of the Court, Knockout, Around-the-World, Horse, Pig, 3-Point Shooting Contest, and more. Whether you're a seasoned baller or new to the game, our arcade-style controls make it easy and fun to play — whether you're standing, sitting, or even lounging.

Hoopzter is powered by 100% realistic physics, meaning the way you shoot, aim, and handle the ball in-game mirrors real-life motion. It’s not just a game — it’s a tool to help hone your actual basketball skills and improve your shot, timing, and control off the court too.

Compete across a variety of dynamic courts — from indoor gyms to street courts and outdoor arenas. With real-time spatial audio, you’ll hear players’ voices coming from their actual position — louder as they approach and fainter as they move away — just like real life on the court.

Show off your style with over 100 custom basketballs, unlockable sneakers with super speed and jump boosts, and a wearables section featuring stylish shoes, chains, and more. Spin up to three basketballs at once and showcase your skill and creativity.

Climb the leaderboards, earn rewards, and challenge friends or new opponents in fast-paced multiplayer matchups.

Want something truly next-level? Turn your living room into a playable court with Mixed Reality Mode. Use passthrough to place a hoop anywhere and start shooting in your own environment!
